author: Stanivision Inc.

changelog.release_notes:
There is a world as tangible as our own, impossible to see yet unavoidable to sense, a world enveloped by an unending ocean of forests. Buried deep in that forest, tucked away neatly by a blanket of twilight, lies a quaint little cabin and in that cabin... lies abuncha guys doing a bunch of bullshit
-------------------------------------------
Know when these guys publish their next podcast, introducing SleepyWatch! (Watch as in keeping an eye on them and like the thing you wear... it works on many levels ok?) 

SleepyWatch has more features than a barrel full of monkeys:
-Know what season and episode number the current podcast episode is!
-Know what the title of the current podcast episode is!
-Read a brief description of the current podcast episode!
-Know what season, episode number, and title of the current podcast episode is without even opening the app thanks to AppGlance (Pebble OS 4 only!)
-See through time and space itself!

Known Bugs:
-If you have lightening fast internet speeds unknown to man, the app WILL crash
-------------------------------------------

Buried deep in that forest, tucked away neatly by a blanket of twilight, lies a quaint little cabin and in that cabin... lies abuncha guys doing a bunch of bullshit
------------------------------------------- 
Know when these guys publish their next podcast, introducing SleepyWatch! (Watch as in keeping an eye on them and like the thing you wear... it works on many levels ok?) 

SleepyWatch has more features than a barrel full of monkeys: 
-Know what season and episode number the current podcast episode is! 
-Know what the title of the current podcast episode is! 
-Read a brief description of the current podcast episode! 
-Know what season, episode number, and title of the current podcast episode is without even opening the app thanks to AppGlance (Pebble OS 4 only!) 
-See through time and space itself! 

Known Bugs: 
-If you have lightening fast internet speeds unknown to man, the app WILL crash 
-------------------------------------------
I don't own SleepyCabin or SleepyCast, nor do I own the logo I used in this app, thanks for your support!
